## Legend

| Column | Meaning |
|--------|---------|
| **Type** | W=Write, F=Fill-in, P=Predict |
| **Level** | I=Intro, P=Practice, E=Edge, Int=Integrated |
| **Code** | Code snippet for predict exercises |
| **Dyn** | ✓ = Dynamic exercise (values change) |
